website_summaries.verdict: A strong post driver of 17 lbs. Owners are satisfied by both the price and their results.
pros: Better for your fences than hammering
Less costly than many other options
cons: This post driver is shorter than some others, which may require the user to adjust force and work harder

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have one arm. This driver lets me drive fence posts with one hand. Before, I struggled to hold the post between my knees and hit the top of the post with a hammer. This tool will make you tired but works. I can now drive in my own darn fence posts without having to ask someone to hold them still. I love it. The only way it would be better would be if someone else did the heavy lifting. :-)
customer_reviews.author: MrChuckles

customer_reviews.title: Pounding Them in
customer_reviews.text: It’s a big chuck of metal for pounding in T-Post. Does exactly that with ease. Pay close attention to how high ya lift it when driving post. I was talking and looking towards my 9 year old and went too high and gave myself a concussion lol
customer_reviews.author: MyOtherNewName

customer_reviews.title: Fence head post driver is easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Need this fence post driver for a small fence. It is amazing how fast it sends the post into the ground. It is sort of heavy and being a woman I have to be careful when I use it. It is a lot better then trying to pound it with a hammer and damaging the post.
customer_reviews.author: xstitcher3277

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: Before I got this I was using a sledge hammer while standing on a ladder. After I got this I couldn't believe how dumb I was putting those metal posts in that way. Save yourself a lot of aggravation and some danger by getting this thing. It's well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: R.. W. P., Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Simple but well built
customer_reviews.text: Good welding, nicely finished paint. Handles are set to be user friendly (slightly towards the user, not at 180 offset from each other). When used, it had more ring than I expected - wear ear protection.
customer_reviews.author: H. K. P.

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life!
customer_reviews.text: Great. I had to drive a few 2” x 6ft green stakes into the ground to support a few birch tree saplings which started growing at a angle. I used to use the old method a 4x4 and sledge hammer. This driver makes it soooo easy even at 6 ft. Granted it was drizzling and I was driving them into grass around a stump. But each on took about 5 hammers to go down 12+ inches. It’s heavy duty and not to heavy, but enough to make it very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Rogerkk

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am disabled and cant do much lifting or physical labor but this is much lighter than other types and it was very quick to get the T posts into the ground took no more than 5 times of lifting it up and "slamming" it down (letting it go)
customer_reviews.author: deathdiver

customer_reviews.title: Great way to drive your T-post.
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use is misleading. Simple to use technically. If you have a lot to drive, it is far from easy on the arms. It is a LOT better than trying to drive posts with a sledgehammer.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: I gotta have if putting up chain link fence post.
customer_reviews.text: A got the have if installing or repairing chain link fence. Great heavy duty built. Don’t think you can wear it out.
customer_reviews.author: rab

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: Makes driving posts super quick and easy. Seems to be of good quality material but just know that there are warnings on it about the chemicals that it contains. I think this explains why they will not ship this item to California as another Amazon customer has noted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! This made setting fence posts so much easier!
customer_reviews.text: I was attempting to set some metal fence posts for my chicken's run. This item made it so much easier, and possible, for a not very strong person to do it without help. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Pounds all types of poles
customer_reviews.text: Pounds in chain link poles and t poles with ease. Drove pipe 6 ft into ground for volleyball net.
customer_reviews.author: Merrill Yancey

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: A must if you pound post or dock poles. My neighbor loves it too because he didn’t have to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Worked Better than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: I had to install 4 large political yard signs across my Township and I was a little weary about this product as it was cheap and I was nervous it couldn't do the job, however, it worked great! Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Kiel H. Sigafoos

customer_reviews.title: Broke right away
customer_reviews.text: Broke after maybe the 20th post I drove. Probably just a defect, seems fairly well done.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Holt

customer_reviews.title: Not just for t-posts
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for t-posts, but it works great for setting 2" galvanized posts in their holes before putting the concrete in. Just gotta be careful not to smash the end of the post up.
customer_reviews.author: kram1961

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for pounding in fence posts. Wish I had it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: woopya

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done
customer_reviews.text: When I received this it had some knicks in it already - it got the job done though
customer_reviews.author: Gail R.

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Strong
customer_reviews.text: Needed one for a long time and nice to have. works like a charm. Very solid and well made. Looks like something that will hold up for many years.
customer_reviews.author: John Gwynne

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: It works as intended. Would be a 5, however one sketchy weld on handle likely to allow water intrusion, which may fail in future. Still, price was right and I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: KodiakFisherman

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like a little post banging in the morning to get the cardio up :-)
customer_reviews.author: Greg R

customer_reviews.title: Nice product to use to put poles in the ground
customer_reviews.text: Nice product to use to put poles in the ground. Easy to use. Fits most poles.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lover

customer_reviews.title: nice if I did not have 2-7/8 inch posts
customer_reviews.text: adv said would work on it...but did not.....I will use on other posts
customer_reviews.author: david talasek

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: It was what I ordered. It will do the job. While it is not light, and will certainly give me a workout, it is not all that heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This works great until you miss the post and wack yourself in the head, but, thankfully, that will only happen once. Great for doing hard work if you don't want to spend a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Turbo

customer_reviews.title: Its heavy
customer_reviews.text: Good price for item. BUT make sure you're around when delivered. Ours was left out on the driveway. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Patti L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: More bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Arrived several days early than scheduled. Easy to use and exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Costa

customer_reviews.title: Man this sucker is heavy! I really need to ...
customer_reviews.text: Man this sucker is heavy! I really need to build up my upper body strength and this is just the thing. Forget those crazy kettle bells. Get you some fences in for those livestock and get buff at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, easy to use. I put in 500 feet of fence posts woth this without issue. I am female and in my 40s.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Grand

customer_reviews.title: works fine
customer_reviews.text: Used it to drive a few fence posts. Slow but sure.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Rabe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Service was excellent in ordering and quality product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Iacovacci

customer_reviews.title: Best way to drive fence posts
customer_reviews.text: Very useful for placing long thin fiberglass poles used to hold up deer netting.
customer_reviews.author: P. Bergstrom

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I used it to drive a galvanized pipe down into a pond bottom.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Grest tool.
customer_reviews.text: Very useful and heavy duty. This thing should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Jack F.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great in Arizona desert soil
customer_reviews.text: It did a great job pounding t-posts and rebar into Arizona desert soil. I like the extra heft at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne C

customer_reviews.title: Works great at half the price for the same driver at my local big box store
customer_reviews.text: Works great at half the price for the same driver at my local big box store
customer_reviews.author: bjorin828

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this to put about 70 or so t posts in and it made it easy!
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Fox

customer_reviews.title: Solid, just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, solid fence post driver at a good price. Love the red color too!
customer_reviews.author: JasonVideo

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: A must have if you need to drive in many t-posts. My soil is very rocky and with this tool I installed 20 posts in no time at all. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: JeffC

customer_reviews.title: T post driver
customer_reviews.text: Yup, it is a fence post driver. As expected. Great deal used.
customer_reviews.author: Shauni

customer_reviews.title: Works, powdercoated steel, cheap
customer_reviews.text: It's a tool that works like it should. All powdercoated steel. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Evergreen State

customer_reviews.title: What I needed for the job.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Used it to drive 6' T-Posts. Handy to have. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Roadhouse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!! Only way to drive the metal posts into the ground!!!!
customer_reviews.author: John W. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I need for driving my tomato fence posts in straight!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality, just used the item works well and save time an effort!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORKS AS ADVERTISED!
customer_reviews.text: It's a tool, it works as it is supposed to. The quality seems good, I drove 20 or more T-post and the driver worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M DeShone

customer_reviews.title: Nice Driver
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Nice weight to it and now I don't have to rent one anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Deej

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for garden fence
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for garden fence. Never ending fence instalation as I battle the racoons and wood chucks. Would be up a creek with out it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bacher

customer_reviews.title: sore back
customer_reviews.text: worx grate made my mussels sore & made me sweet nice post driver!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO much easier than the effort it took to pound ...
customer_reviews.text: SO much easier than the effort it took to pound t posts in w/ a hammer/ ladder!!! Wish I'd bought this years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Becc

customer_reviews.title: It's My Own Dang Fault.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't take the time to do the math. My sign posts are 2" square, and JUST too big for this to do what I wanted it to do. Whatever the inside diameter of this might be is too small for the hypotenuse of the outside dimensions of my posts. Keep that in mind when you are planning your project. I'm sure it would have driven the posts in perfectly, but now I have to find another way to get it done.
customer_reviews.author: anomalink

customer_reviews.title: No energy stake driving
customer_reviews.text: Super fast way to drive a stake... does what it means to do!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Prado

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well installing almost 70 steel posts for my fence.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Oh, yeah - much better than trying to use a sledge hammer...
customer_reviews.text: Oh, yeah - much better than trying to use a sledge hammer - especially for pounding tall stakes...
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT F WASSERMAN

product_meta.title: MAT 901147A Steel Head Fence Post Driver with Handles
product_meta.description: Fence in anything with MAT, 'Your Hardware Ambassador. MAT is a leader in quality fencing products, lawn and garden accessories and distribution solutions. They manufacture and distribute residential and chain link fencing under the YARDGARD brand and agricultural fencing under the FARMGARD brand. MAT also distributes lawn and garden accessories under the long standing Gilbert and Bennett brand.
feature_bullets: Minimizes damage to tops of fence posts when compared to hammering
Handles are tapered for comfortable hand placement

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars162 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
